item.title: By: Steph
item.dc:creator: Steph
item.description: Ooh these look great, I love corn in anything! The crispy bacon on top sounds like an awesome idea!
item.content:encoded: Ooh these look great, I love corn in anything! The crispy bacon on top sounds like an awesome idea!

item.title: By: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.dc:creator: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.description: ohh how delicious! they look very moist :) that would be delicious paired with a spicy chilli con carne!
item.content:encoded: ohh how delicious! they look very moist ðŸ™‚ that would be delicious paired with a spicy chilli con carne!

item.title: By: shez
item.dc:creator: shez
item.description: love the addition of corn kernels into what can otherwise be a little bit of a boring bready-thing. this would be fantastic served with a good hearty beany stew. delish!
item.content:encoded: love the addition of corn kernels into what can otherwise be a little bit of a boring bready-thing. this would be fantastic served with a good hearty beany stew. delish!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: These look nice and easy. I've made cream corn fritters before, but muffins are much easier to freeze for later.
item.content:encoded: These look nice and easy. I’ve made cream corn fritters before, but muffins are much easier to freeze for later.

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: Oooh yes a freshly made cornbread is a thing of beauty indeed :) They look really nice and springy and moist still which is great!
item.content:encoded: Oooh yes a freshly made cornbread is a thing of beauty indeed ðŸ™‚ They look really nice and springy and moist still which is great!

item.title: By: jeena
item.dc:creator: jeena
item.description: Lovely corn bread and the kernels sound delicious.
item.content:encoded: Lovely corn bread and the kernels sound delicious.
